ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Loot for secondaries (was: Eldrig the Old)
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually have no problem with a person claiming class-specific loot for their secondaries...so long as they forgo the same for their primaries. So long as
ygData.messageBody:
I actually have no problem with a person claiming class-specific loot for
their secondaries...so long as they forgo the same for their primaries.
So long as they are only laying claim to one class' loot, I see no
problem switching the two. Now, if their secondary has the same class as
another member of the group, the actual member should obviously have
priority in that class' drops. Then again, my luck has only ever had one
piece of bard-only loot drop in a group I have been in, so I have never
had the chance to be robbed :)

-Karisma
